name: damp

effect.scarlet_violet: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.the_teal_mask: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.the_indigo_disk: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The Pokémon dampens its surroundings, preventing all Pokémon from using explosive moves such as Self-Destruct.
